featured.text: Which of the following is a correct description about setts? (A)
Which of the following descriptions of wetas is accurate? (A)
Which of the following descriptions does NOT fit her?
Steve’s description of the place was so _____ that I could almost picture it in my mind.

definition.zh_def: 描述；對某事物的詳細說明或解釋。
definition.en_def: A spoken or written representation or account of a person, object, or event.
definition.example: The description of the painting was so vivid that I could imagine it clearly.
